WorkItem.Description:
After adding the items to the item database, I attempted to use them, but they would not show up in the list. This happened for other items I tried to add too, but they were added to the static database as of the last release of Rawr so it didn't matter to me.
Â 
I imported them through the armory with their item ID (47545 and 47546). First thing I noticed after being unable to pick the item was that the armory did not list the socket bonus so I grabbed the socket bonus through mmo-champion which was listed as 8 attack power, the items still did not work after adding the socket bonus so now I am stumped.
WorkItem.Summary: Added "Sylvanas' Cunning" and "Vereesa's Dexterity" to the Rawr item database, but I cannot choose them in the list

Comments.Message: Ah turns out it wasn't showing up because the item filters were excluding it. Enabling the All filter makes it show up.
